verses.verse: Be not thou <S%H7065>envious<s%> against <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>; Neither desire to be with <S%H183>them<s%>:
For their <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1897>studieth<s%> <S%H7701>oppression<s%>, And their <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H1696>talk<s%> of <S%H5999>mischief<s%>.
Through <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is a <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H1129>builded<s%>; And by <S%H8394>understanding<s%> it is <S%H3559>established<s%>;
And by <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> are the <S%H2315>chambers<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> With all <S%H3368>precious<s%> and <S%H5273>pleasant<s%> <S%H1952>riches<s%>.
A <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1397>man<s%> is <S%H5797>strong<s%>; <S%H376>Yea<s%>, a man of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> <S%H553>increaseth<s%> <S%H3581>might<s%>.
For by wise <S%H8458>guidance<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> thy <S%H4421>war<s%>; And in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H3289>counsellors<s%> there is <S%H8668>safety<s%>.
Wisdom <S%H2454><s%> is too <S%H7311>high<s%> for a <S%H191>fool<s%>: He <S%H6605>openeth<s%> not his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%>.
He that <S%H2803>deviseth<s%> to do <S%H7489>evil<s%>, Men shall <S%H7121>call<s%> him a <S%H4209>mischief<s%> - <S%H1167>maker<s%>.
The <S%H2154>thought<s%> of <S%H200>foolishness<s%> is <S%H2403>sin<s%>; And the <S%H3887>scoffer<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H120>men<s%>.
If thou <S%H7503>faint<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>adversity<s%>, Thy <S%H3581>strength<s%> is <S%H6862>small<s%>.
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> them that are <S%H3947>carried<s%> away unto <S%H4194>death<s%>, And those that are <S%H4131>ready<s%> to be <S%H4194>slain<s%> see that thou hold <S%H2820>back<s%>.

If thou <S%H559>sayest<s%>, <S%H3045>Behold<s%>, we knew not <S%H8505>this<s%>; Doth not he that weigheth the <S%H3826>hearts<s%> <S%H995>consider<s%> <S%H5341>it<s%>? And he that keepeth thy <S%H5315>soul<s%>, doth not he <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H7725>it<s%>? And shall not he render to every <S%H120>man<s%> according to his <S%H6467>work<s%>?
My <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H398>eat<s%> thou <S%H1706>honey<s%>, for it is <S%H2896>good<s%>; And the droppings of the <S%H5317>honeycomb<s%>, which are <S%H4966>sweet<s%> to thy <S%H2441>taste<s%>:

So shalt thou <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> to be unto thy <S%H5315>soul<s%>; If thou hast <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3426>it<s%>, then shall there be a <S%H319>reward<s%>, And thy <S%H8615>hope<s%> shall not be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>.
Lay not <S%H693>wait<s%>, O <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5116>man<s%>, against the habitation of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>; <S%H7703>Destroy<s%> not his <S%H7258>resting-place<s%>:
For a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man <S%H5307>falleth<s%> seven <S%H7651>times<s%>, and riseth up <S%H6965>again<s%>; But the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are <S%H3782>overthrown<s%> by <S%H7451>calamity<s%>.
Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> not when thine <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H5307>falleth<s%>, And let not thy <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H1523>glad<s%> when he is <S%H3782>overthrown<s%>;
Lest <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7489>it<s%>, and it displease <S%H7725>him<s%>, And he turn away his wrath from <S%H639>him<s%>.
Fret <S%H2734><s%> not thyself because of <S%H7489>evil-doers<s%>; Neither be thou <S%H7065>envious<s%> at the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>:
For there shall be no <S%H319>reward<s%> to the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5216>man<s%>; The lamp of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be put <S%H1846>out<s%>.
My <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H3372>fear<s%> thou <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%>; And <S%H6148>company<s%> not with them that are given to <S%H8138>change<s%>:
For their <S%H343>calamity<s%> shall <S%H6965>rise<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly<s%>; And the <S%H6365>destruction<s%> from them <S%H8147>both<s%>, who knoweth <S%H3045>it<s%>?
These also are sayings of the <S%H2450>wise<s%>. To have <S%H5234>respect<s%> of <S%H6440>persons<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment<s%> is not <S%H2896>good<s%>.
He that <S%H559>saith<s%> unto the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, Thou art <S%H6662>righteous<s%>; <S%H5971>Peoples<s%> shall <S%H5344>curse<s%> <S%H5971>him<s%>, nations shall abhor <S%H2194>him<s%>:
But to them that <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> him shall be <S%H5276>delight<s%>, And a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1293>blessing<s%> shall come upon <S%H935>them<s%>.
He <S%H5401>kisseth<s%> the <S%H8193>lips<s%> Who <S%H7725>giveth<s%> a <S%H5228>right<s%> <S%H1697>answer<s%>.

Prepare <S%H3559><s%> thy <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%>, And make it <S%H6257>ready<s%> for thee in the <S%H7704>field<s%>; And <S%H310>afterwards<s%> <S%H1129>build<s%> thy <S%H1004>house<s%>.
Be not a <S%H5707>witness<s%> against thy <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> without <S%H2600>cause<s%>; And <S%H6601>deceive<s%> not with thy <S%H8193>lips<s%>.
Say <S%H559><s%> <S%H6213>not<s%>, I will do so to him as he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H7725>me<s%>; I will render to the <S%H376>man<s%> according to his <S%H6467>work<s%>.
I <S%H5674>went<s%> by the <S%H7704>field<s%> of the <S%H376>sluggard<s%>, And by the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> of the <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H2638>void<s%> of <S%H3820>understanding<s%>;

And <S%H5927><s%>, lo, it was all grown over with <S%H7063>thorns<s%>, The <S%H6440>face<s%> thereof was <S%H3680>covered<s%> with <S%H2738>nettles<s%>, And the <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H1444>wall<s%> thereof was broken <S%H2040>down<s%>.
Then I <S%H2372>beheld<s%>, and considered <S%H7896>well<s%>; I <S%H2372>saw<s%>, and <S%H3947>received<s%> <S%H4148>instruction<s%>:
Yet a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8142>sleep<s%>, a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8572>slumber<s%>, A <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H2264>folding<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H7901>sleep<s%>;
So shall thy <S%H7389>poverty<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> as a <S%H1980>robber<s%>, And thy <S%H4270>want<s%> as an <S%H4043>armed<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>.
